channel.title: OSCP on 5ysk3y Pwnz
channel.description: Recent content in OSCP on 5ysk3y Pwnz

item.title: Game Zone - Linux
item.description: Overview Today I’ll be bringing you a guide for the Try Hack Me room, Gamezone . This is an invaluable room for anyone looking to familiarize themselves with OSCP level concepts as the first stage leverages an ORDER BY/UNION SQL injection. During this walkthrough we’re going to manually exploit the injection, instead of relying on SQLMap to do it for us, in order to get a password. From there we use SSH Port Forwarding to gain access to a Webmin service that’s locked down, before we use metasploit to compromise that.
